TEXT.S: Sierra leone Itini i 8 30 N, 11 30 W, noAfilika ko Sierra leone. Polong no sekalay i 71,740 sq km "saka 119 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 71,620 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 120 sq km " Polong i 6,018,888 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 56.20 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 37.50 , malo no roma to a sera 6.30 . siyoto O [[[Freetown]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakasepat 27 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Ernest Bai Koroma, patirengan a romi'ad i 2007 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 17 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
